name: Achaemenid King
description:
he history of humankind has always had its ups and downs.
There have been many positive individuals who served, strengthened civilizations and cultures with their efforts. I believe in the good in humanity because of their actions. Their inspiration gives me the hope that it is possible to build a better world and annihilate darkness.

Achaemenid King
The second NFT of Persepolis NFTs collection
Reconstruction of Apadana Palace in Persepolis 𐎱𐎠𐎼𐎿
It was built by the founder of Persepolis "Darius the Great" in 550 BC in Persia.
